message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CR 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and text classification. Additionally, the use of hand-crafted features and gradient boosting classifier suggests the involvement of machine learning techniques, which are commonly used in the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses sampling techniques to improve recall accuracy, which is a common problem in the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the topic of fake news detection is related to the sub-category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) as it involves identifying and preventing the spread of false information.
